entity

Class CannonTower

  • java.lang.Object
    • tilemap.Tile
      • entity.TowerBase
        • entity.CannonTower
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    TowerInterface

    public class CannonTower
extends TowerBase
    This is one kind of tower named Cannon Tower. The cannon tower has its own image and type and other common attributes. This class will be used in the later builds.
    Author:
    Yulong Song, Xunrong Xia

      static java.awt.Image cannonTower

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      CannonTower()
      This is the constructor with no parameter, assign the initial value of the attributes.
      CannonTower(int tileX, int tileY, int tileWidth, int tileHeight)
      This constructor can assign the value of tile's attributes besides the tower's common attributes.

    • Constructor Detail

      • CannonTower

        public CannonTower()
        This is the constructor with no parameter, assign the initial value of the attributes.

      • CannonTower

        public CannonTower(int tileX,
           int tileY,
           int tileWidth,
           int tileHeight)
        This constructor can assign the value of tile's attributes besides the tower's common attributes.
        Parameters:
        tileX - The X coordinate of the tile.
        tileY - The Y coordinate of the tile.
        tileWidth - The width of the tile.
        tileHeight - The height of the tile.

        public void upgrade()
        When a tower be upgraded, its power, level and upgradeCose would be increased. The method override the upgrade() method of TowerInterface.
